constraints.name: interval_length_constraint
constraints.description: 区间长度不超过一年的总天数（即所有月份天数之和）
constraints.formal: e_d + sum(a[i] for i in range(s_m, e_m-1)) + (a[e_m] - e_d) <= sum(a[i] for i in range(n))

constraints.name: valid_day_constraint
constraints.description: 到达日和离开日必须在对应月份的有效天数范围内

constraints.name: non_negative_interval
constraints.description: 离开日必须晚于或等于到达日
constraints.formal: s_d + sum(a[i] for i in range(s_m, e_m-1)) + e_d >= s_d
